Ingredients.3: 0.5 fluid ounces freshly squeezed lemon juice

Ingredients.6: 3 cups ice, divided, or as needed

Directions.1: Combine hot water and brown sugar in a cocktail shaker. Stir until sugar is dissolved. Add lemon juice, bourbon, triple sec, and 1 cup of ice. Cover and shake until chilled, 15 to 20 seconds.

Directions.2: Fill a highball glass with ice. Strain cocktail over ice and top with club soda. Stir to combine. Garnish with a lemon slice.
